div.p: The authors were funded by the BBSRC (SWBio DTP studentship, ref. 1355867) and Danish Council for Independent Research (DFF–1323‐00088). We would like to thank Alain Bourgon, Helen and Christian Briolat, David Demergès, Pierre Desriaux, Claude Dutreix, Anne and Denis Filosa, Alain Migeon, Marc Nicolle, Andrew Szopa‐Comley, W. G. Tremewan and in particular Eric Drouet, for assistance with specimen collection, as well as Tomohito Noda, Robbie Philips and Maria Wild for assistance with preliminary experiments, and Thomas Currie, Sarah C. Paul and Jolyon Troscianko for helpful discussion.
